Question: On October 28, 2009, a documentary film about the rehearsals titled this person's This Is It was released.
Hints: Its content focuses on the hardships and public struggles this person went through just prior to its production.
Throughout 2000 and 2001, this person worked in the studio with Teddy Riley and Rodney Jerkins, as well as other collaborators.
At the turn of the century, this person won an American Music Award as Artist of the 1980s.
